item.title: Machado Presents Trump With Nobel Peace Prize

item.title: Canada Strikes Tariffs Deal With China, as Carney Looks to Diversify From U.S.
item.description: China will in turn cut its own tariffs on Canadian canola products, Prime Minister Mark Carney of Canada said in Beijing on Friday.

item.title: Even Nicolás Maduro’s Prosecutors Are Tied Up Reviewing Epstein Files
item.description: The Trump Administration’s exhaustive examination of materials on the convicted sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein is drawing resources from other cases.

item.title: Stock Investors’ Strategy for 2026: ‘Don’t Fight the White House’
item.description: From oil drillers to credit card companies, President Trump has been a market mover this year.
